001package edu.cnm.deepdive.teamle.model.dao;
002
003import androidx.lifecycle.LiveData;
004import androidx.room.Dao;
005import androidx.room.Insert;
006import androidx.room.Query;
007import edu.cnm.deepdive.teamle.model.entity.GameResult;
008import io.reactivex.rxjava3.core.Completable;
009import io.reactivex.rxjava3.core.Single;
010import java.util.List;
011
012/**
013 * Queries stats from games played for scores screen.
014 */
015@Dao
016public interface GameResultDao {
017
018  String RANKING_QUERY = "SELECT * "
019      + "FROM game_result "
020      + "WHERE size = :size "
021      + "ORDER BY guess_count ASC, duration ASC";
022  String RANKING_QUERY_FOR_RESULT = "SELECT * "
023      + "FROM game_result "
024      + "WHERE size = :size "
025      + "AND user_id = :userId "
026      + "ORDER BY guess_count ASC, duration ASC";
027  String TRUNCATION_QUERY = "DELETE FROM game_result";
028
029  @Insert
030  Single<Long> insert(GameResult gameResult);
031
032  @Query(RANKING_QUERY)
033  LiveData<List<GameResult>> getRankedResults(int size);
034
035  @Query("SELECT * FROM game_result ORDER BY size DESC, guess_count ASC, duration ASC")
036  LiveData<List<GameResult>> getAllRankedResults();
037
038  @Query(RANKING_QUERY_FOR_RESULT)
039  LiveData<List<GameResult>> getRankedResults(int size, long userId);
040
041  @Query(TRUNCATION_QUERY)
042  Completable truncateResults();
043
044  default Single<GameResult> insertAndUpdate(GameResult gameResult) {
045    return insert(gameResult)
046        .map((id) -> {
047          gameResult.setId(id);
048          return gameResult;
049        });
050  }
051}
052
053
